hello: Hello, welcome to artwork local 404. Please respond to the prompts as you see fit. Your response will be anonymized and saved for future use in union pamphlets, promotional material or as raw feedback on our structure and actions.
continue: press 1 to continue, press 2 if you believe unionized collective action is an irrelevant waste of time.
again: Are you intested in answering another prompt?
bye: Thank you for your continued contribution to our collective understanding of arts labour
